With Simon Cowell , and Paula Abdul , and Kara DioGuardi , and Ellen DeGeneres all gone, it's left to`` Idol's'' only surviving judge Randy Jackson to deliver the the talent is most definitely better than ever gag that traditionally kicks off the Hollywood elimination rounds. Double the contestants, double the drama, says Seabiscuit. Double the talent, he adds- not realizing Randy Jackson already covered that base.
